Melee Weapon Attack:
 +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 
Hit:
 1 piercing damage plus 7 (3d4) poison
damage.

description:
Tiny beast, unaligned
A flying snake is a brightly colored, winged serpent found in remote jungles. Tribespeople and cultists sometimes domesticate flying snakes to
serve as messengers that deliver scrolls wrapped in their coils.

The snake doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

name: Flying Snake
